As far as playing alone or with 1 friend even this game is a f*cking joke. Lately they have been pumping out new survivors and killers. In it's current state, I couldn't possibly recommend this game for people to buy. In the most recent patch, the de-sync between killer/survivor on their "dedicated" servers has become so bad that the game itself becomes almost unplayable for survivors. Hits will register positively when killers are almost double their lunge range, making it nearly impossible for survivors to participate in the core game mechanic: looping/avoiding the killer.

In addition, the company willfully ignores player feedback from PTB and other sources, and implements features that are strongly discouraged by the community (such as the most recent UI overhaul). In addition, EVERY PATCH CREATES NEW GAME BREAKING BUGS. These bugs MAY be addressed within a month, but likely they will persist until the next mid-chapter update (in between the "paid chapter" updates). So if a bug exists, learn to live with it.

If you're still unconvinced that this game isn't in a good place, and wish to purchase it, do the following:
1) Wait for a sale on the base game (aim for $10)
2) If you want to play killer, purchase the Leatherface Pack (for BBQ and Chili) and the Plague pack (for Corrupt Intervention and Infectious Fright), and use the Whispers base perk.
3) If you want to play survivor, no additional packs are required, you can make very strong builds with the original four survivors + Bill
4) Try your best not to get frustrated at the state of the game, and hope it improves soon.

2021.06.27 추가 네메씨발련 같은거 쳐 만드는데  삼각두가 씨발 4.6뚜벅이 능력후딜 판자 못부수는데 네메씨발련이라는게 능력 후딜없고 2대 쳐때리면 2단계에 촉수질하면 성공하면 맞고 실패하면 판자 부숴지는 뇌없는 능력에 ㅈ같은 좀비년들은 씨발 무슨 발전기 돌릴라하면 옆에서 태어나고 구할라그러면 갈고리 캠핑에 씨발 어그로끌면 창틀 판자 쳐막고있는데 씨발 이게 살인마라고 쳐 낸 메튜 뇌없는 새끼야    라고 할뻔~ 메튜 씨발아

ゲーム性やキャラは素晴らしいに、運営があまりに酷すぎて台無しのゲーム。
ここの運営は「エアプな上に、プレイヤーの意見を全く聞かない」事で有名で、
両陣営とも数戦PLAYすれば初心者でも気付く事・わかる事が全くわかっていません。
またそれに拍車をかけるのが、煽りや暴言・自分本位な切断などの害悪プレイヤーの異常な多さです。
ゲーム性は本当に面白いのですが、とにかく負の要素が多すぎて絶対にオススメ出来ません。
　
でも良い面はあります。
まずはゲームの世界観とキャラの個性、そして各キャラのスキンデザインです。
キャラはどれも個性的で、スキンは秀逸な物からダサい物・変な物もあって見るだけでも楽しいです。
Бубба - одобряет.

Smurf account I'll confess but I'll review. I love this game!
When I started playing in Sep 2020, I was in a low point in my life and DbD just helped take a lot of those dark times away. In spite of its steep learning curve, I had so much fun getting the grasp of survivor to begin with and the array of killers to face up against were fun and challenging. From loud speedy killers to insiduous stealthy killers like Myers. Really loved the visuals and they were vivid and captivating back then. Imagine my joy on how good they look today, too!

Onto killer- that was an even crueller learning curve but addictive and one I'd come back to.
That role is way more fun although I am wary about playing killer if I'm tired or grumpy.
The map pressure you generate and multi tasking is tricky but really feel a sense of satisfaction when I do get it right! I do sometimes wish I could vary what perks I bring and feel I sometimes have to play around SWFs or common survivor perks but I feel in time I won't have to really do that once I get my bearings around maps and sorts.
Really like the cosmetics BHVR bring out too!

So the dark side... I'll admit I fluctuate with that. I sometimes feel BHVR are survivor sided but recently I feel they have taken on board some of the challenges killers experience and now I am seeing a backlash from survivor mains. So, at this point, I can appreciate how tricky it is for them to get an earful from both sides.

Me? I am one to respect that the meta undergoes changes to just ride out the wave. 
Yes bugs, glitches, all things wrong... easy to think why why why. But BHVR take on the feedback and don't always get a thank you for it xD
Having played LoL for 6 years and feeling how more and more impersonal the gaming company was- I have come to appreciate that BHVR at least view their fanbase as a family and will try if and when.

I look forward to seeing DbD go above and beyond how it currently is doing on its current trajectory :)

Bad Game. Everyone's complaining about the new UI updates as well as game updates. Check the reviews of others for full information. 

Before the updates were pushed, they were given an immense amount of player feedback in their Public Testing Servers declaring that something had to change with their intended updates. 

The UI is horrendous, none of the updates were asked for and the community at the very least wanted some tweaks if the changes were still going through by the Developer team.
No one was happy from all sides of the spectrum(Survivors and Killers alike). 

DO NOT BUY until the developers realign their moral compass when it comes to their player base.

Review date: 2/12/21.

I like it. I wouldn't say that I love it, considering the devs tend to change things that don't really need changing (like the recent hud and movement overhaul) and try to appease player base complaints with new skins (do they realize that it doesn't work?); but it's a decent game, a concept that works really well for the genre of survival horror, and most especially if you don't take it too seriously. I understand that some players can get very competitive during trials--but hey, to each their own in approaching DBD. As for me, I'm just glad I get to survive another day. Or get sacrificed to the entity. Whatever's on the menu during that day.

Right at this moment there is a huge unbalanced game play in dead by daylight.
Most killers (90%) are literally just standing in front of a hooked person and waiting til someone comes. So the options in a match are then to either do 5 gens and open door + escape while leaving the one on hook dead, or to try and rescue but easily get killed urself and put on a hook and camped. The so called new match making system is so bad that its laughable. PLEASE DO  NOT BUY OR DOWNLOAD THIS GAME. YOU WILL BE HARD CAMPED IF CAUGHT AND IT IS NOT ANY FUN. From a survivor perspective.

Definitivamente não vale a pena, principalmente se você gosta de se divertir jogando jogos.
Nos primeiros dias jogando, foi tudo muito divertido, o jogo e as mecânicas em si são bem interessantes, não encontrei nenhum jogo parecido que entregasse a mesma experiência que o Dead By Daylight entrega, principalmente pela parte que você pode escolher jogar de sobrevivente ou killer. Porém, quanto mais eu jogava, mais os problemas (gritantes) do jogo se mostravam nítidos. Cheio de bugs, skills injustas e extremamente desbalanceadas dos killers, jogadores tóxicos tanto killers quanto sobreviventes, que aparecem mais e mais ao longo que seu rank sobe e não são punidos. São inúmeros problemas, que vão deixando você mais e mais frustrado com o jogo, ao ponto em que você desiste de jogar, e quando tenta voltar, pega uma partida frustrante e desiste novamente. Tentei ao máximo jogar o jogo, mas simplesmente não dá.
Dbd poderia ser um jogo ótimo, mas parece que foi abandonado pelos desenvolvedores nesses quesitos, por isso, não recomendo.

Это пиздец. Обновление убило игру. Маньяк пробивает воздухом даже через палеты и телепортируеться через них при оглушении. Анимации зависают. Глаза разбегаются из-за такого интерфейса, сурвы в одном углу , перки в другом, предметы в другом и генераторы вообще сверху. Молодцы. Новые обновление только портят игру, добавили радужного пидораса который хуже любого маньяка по геймплею. Позор

Pros:
- Long progression, always a goal in mind, at least for several thousand hours
-Plenty of replay-ability because of the variety of options for builds, counterplay, maps, etc.
-Tons of cosmetics, many of which can be purchased with unlockable currency, for whatever style you want
-Regular updates about every 1.5 months, several new characters every year
-Lots of different gameplay styles for all kinds of people, tons of room for experimentation and creativity

Cons:
-Suffers from balance issues (as most/all 4 v 1 games do)
-Can be buggy sometimes/performance issues sometimes dependent on your PC
-Difficult to get into, hard on beginners at times, inadequate tutorials (even though they were updated recently)
-Matchmaking speeds are inconsistent due to the asymmetric nature of the game (although usually not terrible)
-Meta is too consistent, rarely does anything change the meta, and it usually isn't fun regardless (just try and stay out of the meta, it's more fun that way in my personal opinion)
top da medo

If you like broken hit boxes, terrible game design, killers that tunnel you and face camp you on the hook, 1 sided matches, console players that dont work with you, no support from the game developers or ways to report players, a ranked system that doesnt indicate player skill, doesnt reward you for reaching the top rank, that doesn't ANYTHING but "Hey at least the skins they're selling are 30% off!" then this is the game for you. The developers of this game put up just enough content you make you think they might care but make no mistake. They do not. All they want is your money. 
If there is any indication as to why I spent so many hours into this game, its because I've played it since its beginnings in hopes that they would change the game. And they have -- for the worst. After watching them make poor decision after poor decision, the only reason the community still playing this game even plays it is because we're so starved for an actually good, well thought out and balanced asymmetrical horror game that we're just desperate enough to play this cesspool of a shit show until the next best thing comes out. And we all hope it comes soon so game developers like this dont get to keep spitting in their player base's face.

Was so much fun, even though it sometimes felt a bit unbalanced at some points. Camping killers were the only annoying thing in my opinion. This recent update is really annoying tho, they changed the UI, the camera is moved more closer to your character, the new animations are odd, it is just a big mess. My friends and I just wanted the game to get a little more balanced, like adding stuff against campers, but now we kinda don’t want to play the game at all anymore. They should have just let the game be the way it was.
